title: ANDaruL paramporuLE
sahitya:
ANDaruL paramporuLE unnai anbinAl vaNanginOm inbat-tiruvaruLE emmai


anupallavi

  vENDu nallaDiyArkku veTri mEl veTri IvAi vEru vEru mathamAm AruNDa kaDalAvAi


caraNam    kanirasap-pAghuDan kaTTi-karumbum pOlE kalanduLLE tittikkum karuNai amudE pOTri
iniyavun AsiyAl ellArum vAzhgavE ihapara nalamellAm jagamengum shUzhgavE
